title: Discharge Instructions
description: An elderly patient is being discharged after a minor procedure. Their adult daughter is with them. Explain the home care instructions, medications to take, and when to come back for a follow-up. Make sure both understand.
context: An elderly patient is ready to go home after a minor outpatient procedure. Their adult daughter is present to help with care. You must explain home care instructions, review medications, and clarify when to return for follow-up. Ensure both the patient and daughter understand the instructions and have a chance to ask questions.
key_points: Review all prescribed medications and dosages
Discuss signs and symptoms that require medical attention
Check understanding with both patient and daughter
